translation: The Gandiva slips from my hand, and my skin burns all over; I am unable to stand, and my mind is reeling, as it were.
commentary: 1.30 Gandivam Gandiva? Slippery slips? from the hand from (my) hand? Tvak (my) skin? f and? Eve also? burns all over? Not not? f and? I am able (I) am able? To be in a position? to stand? seems like whirling? f and? Me my? Manah mind.No Commentary.
